summary: AN ORDINANCE related to land use and zoning, amending Chapter 23.48 and Section 23.54.020 of the Seattle Municipal Code; creating a new SM/D/40-85 zoning classification; adopting an affordable housing incentive program for increased height in areas zoned SM/D/40-85; and amending the Official Land Use Map at pages 72-73 to rezone land in the West Dravus commercial area to SM/D/40-85.
